findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract allows an unauthorized upgrade of the script which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The _mint function allows minting an unlimited number of sundae tokens without any restriction.

findings.title: Unprotected functions in Ownable contract
findings.description: The Ownable contract contains unprotected public functions renounceOwnership and transferOwnership that can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected functions in DividendPayingToken contract
findings.description: Publicly accessible and unprotected functions in the DividendPayingToken contract can be exploited by unauthorized users.
